__e: Now, last night, a young man named Morgan Lane brought the answer.
I heard what Lane said about your husband. He's wrong.
I gave Morgan Lane that lease and I'll get it back.
I know who killed Mary. And I'll tell you who killed Mary Lane.
Me and Lane are the only ones who will put up with him.
That's why Mr. Lane is here- to prevent you from telling.
Well, who would do that? I don't know, but I do know that McLane's dead.
But right now, Ensign Lane's future is more important than teaching me a lesson, sir.
